packets.name: Mahjong Game
packets.description: Mahjong game packets for controlling the in-game Mahjong table. Used for both client commands and server updates.

fields.name: Command
fields.description: Command ID (incoming uses byte prefix + byte command)

subpackets.name: Players Info
subpackets.description: Sends player information for all seats

subpackets.name: Tile Info
subpackets.description: Sends information about a single tile

subpackets.name: General Info
subpackets.description: Sends game state (dice, dealer, wall break)

subpackets.name: Open Seat
subpackets.description: Open a seat for new players

subpackets.name: Move Tile
subpackets.description: Move a tile on the board

packets.name: Mahjong Exit Game
packets.description: Client requests to exit the Mahjong game.

packets.name: Mahjong Give Points
packets.description: Client transfers points to another player.

packets.name: Mahjong Roll Dice
packets.description: Client requests to roll the dice.

packets.name: Mahjong Build Walls
packets.description: Dealer requests to reset and build the tile walls.

packets.name: Mahjong Reset Scores
packets.description: Dealer requests to reset all player scores to base value.

packets.name: Mahjong Assign Dealer
packets.description: Dealer assigns another player as the new dealer.

packets.name: Mahjong Open Seat
packets.description: Dealer opens a seat, removing the current player.

packets.name: Mahjong Change Option
packets.description: Dealer changes game options (show scores, spectator vision).

packets.name: Mahjong Move Wall Break Indicator
packets.description: Dealer moves the wall break indicator position.

packets.name: Mahjong Toggle Public Hand
packets.description: Player toggles whether their hand is visible to others.

packets.name: Mahjong Move Tile
packets.description: Player moves a tile to a new position with direction and flip state.

packets.name: Mahjong Move Dealer Indicator
packets.description: Dealer moves the dealer indicator with direction and wind.
